meanings.definition: to be born again in another body after death.
meanings.sent1: The belief is that the soul reincarnates into a new body.
meanings.sent2: After the caterpillar transforms into a butterfly, it reincarnates into a new life.
meanings.sent3: The cat joked that it would rather reincarnate as a pampered house pet next time.
meanings.sent4: In the cycle of life, each season reincarnates into the next, bringing new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The legend tells of a phoenix that reincarnates from its ashes, symbolizing rebirth and renewal.

meanings.definition: to come back in a new form or body after death.
meanings.sent1: The ghost story tells of a spirit that reincarnates to seek revenge on the living.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, it is believed that a deceased ancestor reincarnates as a newborn baby.
meanings.sent3: The old car reincarnated as a shiny new vehicle after a complete makeover.
meanings.sent4: The fallen leaves on the ground will soon reincarnate as vibrant flowers in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The memories of the past reincarnate in dreams, bringing back forgotten moments.
